About me

I am an inquisitive Computer Science student interested in the fields of Web Development, Data Sciences and Embedded Computing. I am always interested in learning new things, improving what I am familiar with, and finding different ways to solve a problem. I have informal experience of working in teams, am familiar with different development platforms and environments and currently specialize in C and C++ programming.

I like to read, play Table Tennis and listen to music in my free time. My goal is to make computers more accessible to everyone, so they can enjoy a thing I love as well. I wish to make technology more approachable and easier-to-use for everyone using mobile computing and cloud-based applications.

Projects

Startup Landing Page

This is my first interactive Website linked to an online email listing signup page so you can receive updates. Made using only HTML and CSS.

See Live Source Code

Background Generator

This is a Background Generator. It works by taking the color input from website and create a linear gradient from left to right for Color 1 to Color 2. It will be used as a part of a later project. It is made using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

See Live Source Code

Robot Friends

This a React App that allow us to search from a list of robots data card. It is made using the Create-React-App and combination of JSX and CSS.

See Live Source Code

Face Detection through Clarifai API

This is a complete web application made in React.js. It uses Clarifai AI to detect and mark faces on images through web links. It uses nodemon, Node.js for server management and PostgreSQL for database management.

See Live Source Code
